I don't get it to work. At the dashboard it doesn't recognize disc as a game but as a DVD and I dont get the option to install it on my harddrive. Wich flash version do I need?

Just burn the gameimages on dual layer dvds, then install it on your xbox360 harddrive. 
When you're going to play the game, insert the dvd but play from the hard drive instead :)


The game will now stop freezing :)  ! It works 100% for me. Before I did this it would freeze all the time and I burned with 4- and 6x speed.

First game download for me, can someone tell me from scratch what i need to do please, have standard xbox elite... Much appreciated !

Your xbox got the las firmware released by C4eva?
Or it is original?

@ Mr_Detzoe: You need to go on craigslist and find a person to flash your DVD drive(requires them to open xbox up and void warranty), it is best if you open it up and find what manufacture you have for your drive as there are many(hitachi,samsung, etc) and ask the flasher if they can do that drive.
Next you want to go to a electronics store and get VERBATIM DVD+R DL(only disk to work with burning games).
Download IMGburn.
Download ABGX 360 GUI
Check to make sure game will work on xbox with ABGX
Open IMGburn and write image to disk(make sure you select .dvd file)
Put disk in your dvd dl drive(need a dvd dl burner for dl disk)
Sleep, eat, shit, or smoke a blunt. Come back and your game will be ready for your flashed xbox.
I bought a ssomewhat broken xbox off craigslist and found a guy to flash it for $20 on criagslist. 
I would NOT flash a new/main xbox you use for all your gaming/movies/netflix/hulu as your console will be banned if you are caught modding your xbox.

Hope this helps out, and good gaming to you.
